paper_abstract: Checking P-property and nonnegative invertibility of real and interval matrices has been widely investigated in the literature. In this paper, we try to extend the study to fuzzy matrices of fuzzy numbers, by employing the methods used for the corresponding interval matrices. To determine the degree of P-property and nonnegative invertibility for a fuzzy matrix, we propose an algorithm. Applications in matrix stability are given via the numerical examples. paper_title: Determination of the degrees of P-property and nonnegative invertibility for a fuzzy matrix
